metadata.name: Blue Mercury
metadata.description: This acrylic painting (20"x26") is currently on view till August 5, 2022 at Arlington County Board Office (2100 Clarendon Boulevard, Arlington, VA, 22201, Third Floor, Suite 300). All proceeds from the purchase of “Blue Mercury” NFT will be DONATED to Sunflower of Peace (sunflowerofpeace.com) a non-profit supporting the people of Ukraine affected by the war. Please help to help Ukraine.
